query:
ALTER TABLE database_connections 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS host VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS port INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `database` VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS username VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS password TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS filePath TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS connectionOptions TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastTestedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastTestStatus VARCHAR(50);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute ALTER TABLE database_connections 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS host VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS port INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `database` VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS username VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS password TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS filePath TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS connectionOptions TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastTestedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastTestStatus VARCHAR(50);
